document.full_text: prosecutors ended their cross examination of rod blagojevich on tuesday by pressing the former illinois governor to explain whether he was considering a deal worth $1.5 million in campaign contributions in exchange for appointing rep. jesse jackson jr. to the senate.
document.title: blagojevich quizzed on alleged jackson deal
lines_and_colors: prosecutors ended their cross examination of rod blagojevich on tuesday by pressing the former illinois governor to explain whether he was considering a deal worth $1.5 million in campaign contributions in exchange for appointing rep. jesse jackson jr. to the senate.
